external_games.name: Hello Kitty Kruisers with Sanrio Friends
Hello Kitty Kruisers with Sanrio Friends

name: Hello Kitty Kruisers with Sanrio Friends
storyline: Race by land, sea and air in cars, boats and planes with ten of your favorite Sanrio characters including Hello Kitty, Badtz-Maru , Keroppi, My Melody and many more. Challenge yourself with adventure, quick play and tournament single-player modes, or challenge your friends and family with multiplayer quick play and tournaments. Unlock new characters, vehicles, power-ups and customizable gear to personalize (and rev-up) your gameplay experience. Zoom through sixteen unique tracks in five distinct worlds (like Island Paradise, Icicle Alley and more). Complete objectives, earn stars and unlock bonus content as you race through twenty tricky tracks in adventure mode.
summary: Hello Kitty Kruisers is a family-friendly racing game that brings Hello Kitty fansan action-packed adventure. On land, over water, and through air, race your way to victory as Hello Kitty and her Sanrio friends!
